info.name: Matt Evans
info.title: Developer & Graphic Designer
info.summary: Front-End Developer with PHP and Full-Stack experience, coming from a graphic design background and with professional experience in both customer-service and technical roles. Highly adaptable, quick to learn, and able to juggle multiple tasks. A versatile creative with skills working as part of a team or individually on projects.

experience.title: Bindary Operator
experience.bio: Bindery operations included cutting, folding, and binding of printed materials. Other duties included cutting and mounting of large format signage, on-site installations, and maintaining and monitoring envelope printers and inserters. Responsibilities include maintaining the workshop floor and monitoring stock levels.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.bio: Update and redesigning the company website. This role included modernisation of the HTML to current web standards, as well as a complete graphical and layout redesign. Challenges included creating a design colour preview app from scratch, and being unable to alter the back-end PHP.

experience.title: Print Room Assistant
experience.bio: Assisting in the day to day running of the screen printing workshop. Primary duties included maintaining, screening and burning silk screens for use in both manual and automatic printing machines. Other duties included maintaining back-room workshop, negative filing, and occasional print-room relief during busy periods.

experience.title: Layout Editor
experience.bio: Creating and maintaining layouts and styling for Bunbury magazine. Managing colour themes and typeface, as well as creating typography, illustrations, and graphical assets as required.

education.institution: University of Wales Trinity St David, Swansea
qualifications: Level 4 Diploma, Foundation Art and Design
Certificate of Education, Material Science and Engineering
